name: UpdateNativeAssemblyDeclaration
description: Update native assembly declaration following a class library tag.
author: nanoFramework Project Contributors

inputs.name: SourceFileName
inputs.label: Source file to update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source file (in nf-interpreter repository) containing the assembly declaration to update with the new version.

inputs.name: ClassLibName
inputs.label: Class library
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Class Library that is being updated to a new version.

inputs.name: GitHubToken
inputs.label: GitHub token
inputs.helpMarkDown: GitHub token to be used for authentication when committing changes and submitting the pull-request.

inputs.name: NuGetVersion
inputs.label: NuGet version
inputs.helpMarkDown: NuGet version of the Class Library NuGet package that is being updated to a new version.

inputs.name: AssemblyVersion
inputs.label: Assembly version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target assembly version of the Class Library that is being updated.
